website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive aluminum telescoping ladder that is lightweight and portable, although some found it to be a little unstable the higher up you climbed.
pros: Lightweight, and comes with a free bag for portability
cons: Some buyers felt the rungs were too small, particularly in the higher segments
this made the ladder seem less sturdy the farther up it you went
The retraction process can also be a little tricky

customer_reviews.title: Great "little" ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Compact, and yet extends to 10.5'. Very easy to extend and retract. Velcro strap to secure it closed when done, and a handy storage bag with hand slot for easy carrying. Bought for use with our camper...easily reach the top of the slide out or bunks to clean off before closing up. And stores in a minimal amount of space (only about 20" wide, 36" high and 3-4" thick). Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tom Straten

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable ladder for the camper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder. I purchased this to use in our camper for roof access and to check slides when closing them up. The bag to carry it was nice and big, didn't have to try and squeeze this into the bag which is nice. Easy to store in the camper. I'm 260lbs and I felt comfortable on he ladder.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE LADDER DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is not rated by OSHA. Another very disturbing thing to note is that it does not have a manufacturer's name on it anywhere. The smoke screen are all of the "safety yellow" stickers on it everywhere. This is definitely a Chinese knock off. I used it twice and the second time the first rung broke. If I had been any higher it would have been disastrous. Others have had the same experience with broken rungs. I am a professional carpenter that weighs 175 pounds, and I have had over 10 ladders. Not a single one had ever had a rung "break". This should be pulled from the shelves and recalled. DO NOT BUY THIS LADDER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ed

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT ON THE PLANET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST PRODUCT ON THE PLANET!!!! Please DON'T BUY THIS LADDER! If you don't have ALL of the rings locked securely in place (which is difficult to confirm), it WILL COLLAPSE WHILE YOU ARE ON IT! That happened to me! My foot got caught in the collapsed ladder with me still on it so my weight on top of the rung ALMOST BROKE MY FOOT! Thank goodness I was only about 4 rungs up when it happened or it could have been a terrible disaster! I would have returned it but by the time I got around to using it, it was too late. All I can do now is throw it away and WARN potential buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Ytmom

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for keeping in my camper van.
customer_reviews.text: I used this ladder for the first time recently. I purchased it to carry in my camper van. I can lift it and really love the bag that came with it, That has both a shoulder strap and a hand opening that makes carrying the ladder very easy for me. I used it to reach the top of my van which is over 8 feet tall and it felt sturdy. I am extremely pleased with this ladder for it's purpose. I won't be using this ladder all the time but need it anytime I need to reach the top of my van.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for better!
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible deal. Bar none the most affordable ladder of its kind I've seen, and I shopped around. I was worried it might turn out to be junk or something, but no, I love it! This is the first time I've ever used one of these, and it's shocking how easy it is to open and close. It's sturdy but not too heavy, feels like quality. I am a new home-owner and live in a very tiny house so being able to store this so easily is huge. And while it wasn't Prime eligible, I received it a week early. Just wow.
customer_reviews.author: EllaKayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A great idea, but only reasonably sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A great idea, but only reasonably sturdy. I wouldn't go up near the top when carrying stuff. I don't think I'd trust the taller versions. Obviously the best part is how small it collapses down to. Came with a protective dust cover / bag.
customer_reviews.author: tsilb

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works and is very convenient since it retracts down to a small size. The carrying case is nice to have. A little clanky when releasing each level to have it close back up but nothing major. Very useful for us to have around the house to reach high windows and to get up into the attic.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works for my use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use to access attic through 2x2' opening. It is lightweight and the adjustable height was needed and it works perfectly for this use. The ladder does flex some so I would not suggest heavy loading. When lowering the ladder you need to be careful follow the instructions and absolutely do not have any fingers inside the rungs. When the locks are moved the upper part of the ladder can come crashing down and would do serious finger damage.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fix!
customer_reviews.text: This item works really well, even my handy man love it and wants to purchase one for himself! I recommend this product if room is an issue!
customer_reviews.author: May Cote

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for my small space. I use it to get up to the loft in my pool house. You do have to be a little careful when you pack it up - the rugs can slam down on your hand. I found these out when I was in a rush and not paying total attention to what I was doing. But I wouldn’t let that stop me from buying it again. Fairly light, easy to take up and down, Stowe’s away easily when not in use. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: MyLabRunsMe

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works. I trust it, but operating it is a learning process. It's good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality ladder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and quality. Added a hook system to use with our Alu-cab roof top tent. Stores in a decent supplied bag and easy to use, very solid and sure-footed product.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy but lightweight ladder
customer_reviews.text: I use this ladder to access my attic through a trap door in a 9 foot ceiling. It is perfect for this purpose. The ladder is simple to deploy and sturdy to use. It stores compactly and unobtrusively in its case. It is lightweight and easy to position. It also collapses quickly with sliding clips on each rung, and the rungs collapse in stages to help avoid pinched fingers. A great deal especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Cram

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I do suggest you read instructions first as you can catch your fingers easily if you are not careful. Bag is a great addition and fits in my closet. I use it as an attic ladder
customer_reviews.author: DavePA

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I got the 10
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I got the 10.5 ft ladder. It's for accessing my attic. I only have 8 ft ceilings, but the extra is definitely safer. It did take me a bit to figure out how to get the ladder fully extended, because I had to do it with the ladder standing up and I am only so tall, but I stood on a step stool and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: lzrd

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea and what a space saver
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant idea and what a space saver. I have no storage and this ladder easily stores under my bed. It opens and closes just as easily. This ladder was the perfect solution to a complex problem where space is an issue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: witty imp

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder in very little space
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder and great space saver! The locking mechanism makes me nervous as I fear I may activate it when I am grabbing the rung. But so far I have managed to avoid that and I LOVE the space savings
customer_reviews.author: VCS

customer_reviews.title: Must have for RV'ers.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for RV'ers. Tall enough to reach the top of your RV or trailer and small enough to stick in your trailer storage area. I use it for my travel trailer and it allows me to access the top of my bump out to clean it off before closing. Over size carry bag makes putting the ladder away easy. I am 250 pounds so it holds my weight without any problem and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I love the portability of this ladder and that it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability of this ladder and that it takes very little space to store when collapsed. I have a mountain cabin that has one smoke alarm that I cannot reach with my step stool. I didn't want a regular ladder because I have no garage or place to store one. This ladder is perfect and can lean against the wall right under the smoke alarm so I can change the battery when needed. Then it easily stores in its case in a bedroom closet. It is sturdy, well built and I am able to lift it easily. I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I really this ladder for the price. It's lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: I really this ladder for the price. It's lightweight for its size and does the job. CAUTION watch your fingers/hands when closing. Make sure and read the directions regarding closing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder the cost
customer_reviews.text: It's a great ladder and the collapsibility makes it a good choice for cramped storage conditions. It's manual states it was a weight limit of 350 LBs, but it does flex a lot, once it's extended and my 155 LBs self climbs up on it. Everything locks into place, as it should and all around a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Compact & light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! Not too heavy. Opens very easy. Folding is a little tricky but not bad. Does not have to be open all the way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: SUP

customer_reviews.title: Great, unique ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ladder. Very sturdy and extends to 10.5 feet. Telescopes back down easily to about 30" (H) x 24" (W). Durable storage case as well, and entire set up weighs a very manageable 20 lbs. Using with my travel trailer. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for our trailer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ladder because it was compact and easy to haul in our trailer. Works great to reach the top of the slide out to clean it before rolling it back in. Just be very careful when collapsing the ladder, it will pinch your fingers if you have them in the wrong place. It's not too heavy to carry and it extends way above the roof of our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: KS in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for that and is compact enough to stowe away easily in the pass through compartment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get up and clean off the slideout on my travel trailer. Works very well for that and is compact enough to stowe away easily in the pass through compartment. Constantly have people ask me at RV parks where I got it. Well please.
customer_reviews.author: NBB

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT be careful
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is great for people tight on space and storage. You need to ensure everything is locked and DO NOT let it hit your fingers when you bring it down. It will HURT. I am glad I made the purchase and I will recommend to friends with caution!!
customer_reviews.author: AntneeLINY

customer_reviews.title: Works well and stores better
customer_reviews.text: it is great to use and easy to store. will take your fingers off if you dont follow directions. read somewhere this could be used as A frame ladder... dont see it and wasnt shopping for it. Packs well too.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great spacesaver.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this ladder, I am over 200 lbs and have used it many times without a problem the last month. Seems to be very well made and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Older Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Best rv'ers ladder ever.
customer_reviews.text: A absolutley the best product ever for fulltime rver's. Looking to buy a second one soon. Collapses to a small little ladder that fits in the storage box, extends to 10ft perfect for a c-class rv. Bought for a friend. I want one now. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around the house with limited storage.
customer_reviews.text: I might say this is a very handy, convenient and sturdy ladder. Very clever and good idea. Takes no space when folded and it is long enough to do anything or reach anything in the house, RV when unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to extend and works great
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and compact. Price is competitive with retail stores.. Available with prime. Retail stores had to order so Amazon is the way to go. Very easy to extend and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Zon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, sturdy, lightweight ladder
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ladder, not only for convenience and storage, but for being able to access hard to reach places that an extension or step ladder cannot be used because the extension ladder is too tall to get around a corner. Also the perfect solution for easy access to an attic. 5 Stars in every category
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: super useful - I use this to access the top ...
customer_reviews.text: super useful - I use this to access the top cargo bin on my van. It is very durable and compact. I can toss it in the van and use it at the camp site on the other end of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ladder. It’s very sturdy. I love how easily it folds up and fits in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Logan

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled I bought this product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about such compact ladders many years ago. They are much easier to carry around and store, and this one met all my hopes based on the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to an apartment or RV
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for its portability and were not disappointed. Collapsible to a manageable size and with the carrying case it's easy to transport. Perfect for an apartment or RV. Definitely worth the price and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie F

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I needed a ladder to take camping for my RV. This ladder collapses down to a nice small size and yet still lets me expand it to get on top of my camper when needed. I am not a small guy and it feels strong enough to hold me fine.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: like the product. Takes getting used to opening & closing.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ladder
customer_reviews.text: I like this ladder. Totally adjustable for whatever night that you need. Very durable & strong. You can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: brandyrose

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder. If you don't have one of these
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder. If you don't have one of these, you really need one. I primarily use this for my travel trailer to get on the roof. It's lightweight and very easy to store. Looks like good construction, but I've yet to abuse it, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ArnellTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is working as advertised and resolves a need i had for reaching a difficult spot to our attic
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Haake

customer_reviews.title: Great to use on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Good tool to keep around and easy to store in RV storage compartments. It's a big help not having to carry around a big ladder.
customer_reviews.author: jessica monsivaiz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder for small uses - I weigh 260 and it held me with no problems. This is a good addition to a 6ft step ladders most have in thier homes.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought for 5th wheel camper. Nice size retracted and bag is very handy

customer_reviews.title: This ladder is the best. It can hold over 200 pounds without any ...
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is the best. It can hold over 200 pounds without any trouble. It's also just high enough to get me to the top of my camper, and I can store it in the bed of my pickup. Easy to put up and take down. I would recommend this for any work around a recreational vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great ladder for the price! Easy to carry, easy to store, and adjustable through a range of heights. Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Weak and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is weak and flimsy It keeps shaking. I’m 140 pounds and I had to have someone hold the ladder while I try to climb up, it keeps leaning to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Good locking mechanisms for each rung
customer_reviews.text: Have used a few times now. Seems sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Falcmanb

customer_reviews.title: so good. I have used for a dozen times (185 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have used for a dozen times (185 lb) and no issues. Seems solid when used at correct angles.
customer_reviews.author: AVLent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ladder
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size works amazing fits in very small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Stephen ulerick

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Have to it standing against a wall does not stand alone
customer_reviews.author: kenneth smith

customer_reviews.title: Best compact ladder ever.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our RV my husband loves this ladder. It’s compact and easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: TERI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this idea. So easy to carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder, easy to use and store away
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! All the negatives you read here are probably from the competition trying to sell their ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Works great for getting to my G550 roof rack with rocket ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for getting to my G550 roof rack with rocket box. Also use it to wash the truck given its height.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ladder. Very well made; and at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Engel

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, not so great. Didn't feel secure and I didn't even have it fully extended. I'm 182 lbs and it was unsteady and too flexible in middle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Desz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an RV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ladder for keeping in my RV. Exactly what I needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you need something discreet this is good. It’s a little weak
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ladder. Works great for climbing on my RV to clean solar panels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great extension ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Ladder arrived in perfect condition. Ladder extension works very well, and the ladder bag with strap is very handy. Used the ladder several times so far, and we are quite satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my camper. Takes up very little room and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is sturdy and a space saver! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jalva321

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for Motorhomes.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and is perfect for my motorhome. Thanks Limaotong
customer_reviews.author: steven fischer

customer_reviews.title: This type of ladder is very easy to use indoors and is very compact for storing ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a ladder for inside access to the attic. This type of ladder is very easy to use indoors and is very compact for storing in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in NH

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use and stronger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This ladder opens and closes really easily. It's not too heavy either. I'm 200lbs and it holds me fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Myles

customer_reviews.title: 10 foot ladder
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact and light the ladder is. It is eady to assemble if i extend and close it while laying it flat on the ground. I wish i had ordered a taller one though but i needed this one because it was light
customer_reviews.author: leslie crompton

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly in great shape.  Good seller.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is super easy to use and real light weight. I use it for work. It's blows away other foldable ladders that are 2 to 3 times the weight.
customer_reviews.author: connie haddad

customer_reviews.title: Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Love the way you can extend and then lower it back up put it in the bag. Does not take up much room anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Termini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so easy to use I can not reach the top of the RV
customer_reviews.author: Carol Espalin

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Ladder.
customer_reviews.text: All that you said it would be. Excellent product perfect for our motor home
customer_reviews.author: Janet Johani

customer_reviews.title: RVing?
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in the storage compartment of a RV. Very lite, but will hold a lot. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: amanda rippey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love how easy it is too open and close

customer_reviews.title: Aa
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it every day for light work.

product_meta.title: Idealchoiceproduct 10.5 FT Aluminium Telescopic Telescoping Ladder Extension Steps
feature_bullets: Fully extended height to 10.5ft, constructed with heavy duty & durable aluminum
Lightweight, portable and suitable for a a variety of domestic and commercial uses
Flodable design, convenient to use and easy to carry around
The ladders lock into each position to provide an easy to use locking mechanism
Light weight,Easy for transport and storage, the ladder can be stored into RV or closet,ideal for daily use at home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
